metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37300 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the CheckUserLog API in the CheckUser extension for MediaWiki through 1.39.3. There is incorrect access control for visibility of hidden users.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
